1604065298_mirrored_Igitzu_github.body: I am having this problem on a local install of zeronet, going over tor (always), using Firefox 59.0.2 (64-bit) on Ubuntu 16.04.  It's a new Firefox profile, save for the MM3-Proxy Switch extension, which I'm using to connect to Tor.  I use the same proxy extension on Chromium 65.0.3325.181, along with many other extensions, and I don't have that problem at all.
